{"id":1503446722,"question_id":3394,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â weeks","timestamp":1736459860,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1503446722/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Array End","memory":"8.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long minEnd(int n, int x) { //1 <= n, x <= 10^8\n        //nums[i] < nums[i+1]\n        // x == nums[0] & nums[1] & ... & nums[n-1]\n        n--;\n        long long result = x;\n        long long mask;\n        for(mask=1; n>0; mask <<=1) {\n            if( (mask&x) == 0 ) {\n                result |= (n&1)*mask;\n                n>>=1;\n            }\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-array-end","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
